content.en:
![city-scene](//images.contentful.com/2h2wj50mwc16/2epfwK3jpiC2COwCWE6i42/f95fe703954be367151e3fcdb26c2892/city-scene.svg)
# I Can't Pay My Rent
There are still options to explore when you can't pay rent. To get started, choose all the statements on the right that apply to you.
content.es:
![city-scene](//images.contentful.com/2h2wj50mwc16/2epfwK3jpiC2COwCWE6i42/f95fe703954be367151e3fcdb26c2892/city-scene.svg)
# No puedo pagar mis servicios publicos
There are still options to explore when you can't pay rent. To get started, choose all the statements on the right that apply to you.

content.en:
### Get in touch sooner than later
Taking the initiative to contact your landlord will help build trust. Try giving him/her a call and saying something like, “Hi (landlord), just wanted to make you aware that I’m having some trouble with the rent this month. I’m very sorry for the inconvenience, and I hope we can work out a plan to get it paid as soon as possible.” This allows your landlord to consider their options as well as yours in a calm, and informed way.
content.es:
### Pongase en contacto cuanto antes.
Tomar la iniciativa de contactar con el rentero ayudará a crear confianza. Intente llamarle y decir algo como, "Hola (rentero), solo quería decirle que estoy teniendo problemas con la renta este mes. Lo siento mucho por la inconvenencia, y espero que lleguemos a un acuerdo para poder pagarlo lo mas pronto posible." Esto permite que el rentero considere sus opciones asi como las suyas de una manera calmada y en comunicacion.

content.en:
### Be easy to reach
Be sure to answer any calls, emails or texts from your landlord as soon as you receive them. When you are responsive, you show your landlord that you respect his/her time and that you aren’t going to disappear.
content.es:
### Sea facil de contactar.
Asegurese de contestar todas las llamadas, correos o textos que reciba del rentero tan pronto como las reciba. Cuando es responsable, le demuestra  que respeta su tiempo y que no se esta escondiendo.

content.en:
### Suggest solutions
You want your landlord to know that you eventually intend to pay. As a show of good faith, it’s very helpful to suggest temporary or alternate solutions, such as a partial payment or a payment plan. Make sure to get any agreement in writing.
content.es:
### Sugiere soluciones
Lo que usted quiere es que el rentero sepa que eventualmente pretende pagarle. Como una muestra de buena fe, es de mucha ayuda sugerir una solución temporal o alternativa, como un pago parcial o un plan de pago. Asegurese de llegar a un acuerdo escrito.

content.en:
### Apologies are better than excuses
Unless the details of your situation will lead to a viable payment solution, then it’s best not to offer any extra information. Simply apologize and focus on the best way to get your rent paid in the shortest amount of time.
content.es:
### Las disculpas son mejores que las excusas
A menos que los detalles de su situación lleven a una solución de pago posible, lo mejor es no dar información extra. Simplemente disculpese y concentrese en la mejor forma de pagar su renta en el menor tiempo posible.

text.es: Consiga asistencia para los servicios publicos

content.en:
### Call your Utility Provider
Your utility company may have a program that can help customers pay their bills, including creating a payment plan.
content.es:
### Llame a su proveedor de servicios publicos.
Su compañía de servicios publicos puede tener un programa que ayude a los clientes a pagar sus cobros, incluyendo crear un plan de pago.

content.en:
### Find government assistance
Many state and local government agencies have programs that can help with your utility bill. Find out more here:
content.es:
### Busque asistencia gobernamental
Muchos estados y agencias de gobiernos locales tienen programas que pueden ayudarle con las cobros de servicios publicos. Encuentre mas información aquí:

content.en:
### Apply for LIHEAP
Assistance is available through the federal Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program. Each state is different, so make sure to look up your state and ask about what it takes to qualify.
content.es:
### Aplique para la LIHEAP
Programa de asistencia para la energia de hogares con bajo salario. Cada estado es diferente, asi que asegurese de verificar el de su estado y preguntar sobre que se necesita para calificar en este programa.

content.en:
__General Criteria__
- Residents with very young children, elderly or disabled family members
- Homes with low-incomes and high regional costs
content.es:
__Criterios generales__
- Residentes con hijos pequeños, personas de edad avanzada o miembros de familia discapacitados.
- Hogares con bajo salario y altos costos regionales.

text.es: BUSQUE INFORMACION DE CONTACTOS DE SU ESTADO

content.en:
__Reduce your home energy usage & costs__
Weatherization Assistance Programs (WAP) help renters and homeowners reduce their home heating, cooling, and electricity usage and provide financial assistance to improve and update home systems. Income restrictions may apply.
content.es:
__Reduce your home energy usage & costs__
Weatherization Assistance Programs (WAP) help renters and homeowners reduce their home heating, cooling, and electricity usage and provide financial assistance to improve and update home systems. Income restrictions may apply.

content.en:
__Check out the Lifeline federal program__
Lifeline is a federal program that can help lower the monthly costs of phone and internet for eligible customers.
content.es:
__Check out the Lifeline federal program__
Lifeline is a federal program that can help lower the monthly costs of phone and internet for eligible customers.

text.en: SEE IF YOU QUALIFY FOR LIFELINE
text.es: SEE IF YOU QUALIFY FOR LIFELINE

content.en:
__Apply for an internet subsidy__
Many internet providers have reduced rates for families who earn below $35,000/year, receive SNAP or public housing assistance, or qualify for free and reduced lunch.
content.es:
__Apply for an internet subsidy__
Many internet providers have reduced rates for families who earn below $35,000/year, receive SNAP or public housing assistance, or qualify for free and reduced lunch.

text.en: SEE IF YOU QUALIFY FOR AN INTERNET SUBSIDY
text.es: SEE IF YOU QUALIFY FOR AN INTERNET SUBSIDY

content.en:
### Contact your local 2-1-1
They can connect you with other organizations that help with housing issues. See what’s available near you.
content.es:
### Contacte a su 2-1-1 LOCAL
Ellos pueden conectarle con otras organizaciones que ayudan a estos problemas de hogar. Mire cual está disponible cerca de usted.

content.en:
### Find a Catholic Charities agency
They help people with housing issues all the time. See what’s available in your neighborhood.
content.es:
### Encuentre una Agencia Caritativa Católica
Ellos ayudan a la gente con problemas en el hogar todo el tiempo. Verifique si hay alguna disponible en su vecindario.

buttonText.es: ENCUENTRA TU AGENCIA CARITATIVA CATOLICA LOCAL

content.en:
### Apply for a Modest Needs grant
These small, emergency sums of money are allocated to low-income workers. Find out more by visiting their website.
content.es:
### Aplica para la concesion de Necesidades Modestas
Estas pequeñas sumas de dinero para emergencias, son dirigidas a los trabajadores de bajo salario. Encuentre mas información visitando su pagina web.

content.en:
__Apply for rental payment assistance__
Check to see if rental payment assistance is available where you live. Income restrictions may apply.
content.es:
__Apply for rental payment assistance__
Check to see if rental payment assistance is available where you live. Income restrictions may apply.

content.en:
### Talk to a counselor
If you won’t be able to pay your rent for a while, then a free session with a housing counselor is the best option for you. The counselor may know about lower cost rental options in your area or programs you may qualify for. A counselor may also be able to help you prioritize your expenses and find payment assistance.
content.es:
### Talk to a counselor
If you won’t be able to pay your rent for a while, then a free session with a housing counselor is the best option for you. The counselor may know about lower cost rental options in your area or programs you may qualify for. A counselor may also be able to help you prioritize your expenses and find payment assistance.

buttonText.en: FIND A HOUSING COUNSELOR NEAR YOU
buttonText.es: FIND A HOUSING COUNSELOR NEAR YOU

content.en:
### Apply for unemployment benefits
Don’t wait to file! After you fill out your application, it can take a few weeks to get your first check.
content.es:
### Apply for unemployment benefits
Don’t wait to file! After you fill out your application, it can take a few weeks to get your first check.

content.en:
__Connect with a career center__
Get access to full-time or part-time job postings, free career counseling, and free or low-cost job training and certification programs.
content.es:
__Connect with a career center__
Get access to full-time or part-time job postings, free career counseling, and free or low-cost job training and certification programs.

text.en: See if you qualify for any government benefits
text.es: See if you qualify for any government benefits

content.en:
### Take the Benefits assessment
Government benefits can help with anything from food bills to doctors bills. Even if you don’t qualify for help with your rent bill, you might qualify for something else that will free up more money for your rent.
content.es:
### Take the Benefits assessment
Government benefits can help with anything from food bills to doctors bills. Even if you don’t qualify for help with your rent bill, you might qualify for something else that will free up more money for your rent.

content.en:
### Save all documents and seek help
If you believe you are being treated unfairly by your landlord or property manager, get in touch with a tenants rights organization to see what your options are. The following website has a list of tenants rights resources and legal assistance available in your state. You may be able to get help from an attorney provided by the court for those who can’t afford a lawyer and they can help you understand the eviction process, your rights and your options. Your new attorney will need to see all notices, letters or emails from your landlord as well as from any other lawyers or courts.
content.es:
### Save all documents and seek help
If you believe you are being treated unfairly by your landlord or property manager, get in touch with a tenants rights organization to see what your options are. The following website has a list of tenants rights resources and legal assistance available in your state. You may be able to get help from an attorney provided by the court for those who can’t afford a lawyer and they can help you understand the eviction process, your rights and your options. Your new attorney will need to see all notices, letters or emails from your landlord as well as from any other lawyers or courts.

text.en: FIND TENANTS RIGHTS ADVOCATES IN YOUR STATE
text.es: FIND TENANTS RIGHTS ADVOCATES IN YOUR STATE

content.en:
### Open a savings account
When you save small amounts of money over time, you create a safety net for any unexpected bills. Have a savings goal in mind when you open your account, and it will give you the motivation to get started. Also, do an internet search to see if a nonprofit near you has an “Individual Development Account” (IDA) program, a special savings account that will add matching funds every time you save.
content.es:
### Abra una cuenta de ahorros.
Cuando ahorra pequeñas cantidades de dinero con el tiempo, crea una red de seguridad para algun cobro inesperado. Tenga una meta de ahorro en mente cuando abra su cuenta, eso le dará una motivación a empezar. También, haga una busqueda en internet para ver si hay un programa no lucrativo, como el programa de  "Cuenta de Desarrollo Individual" (IDA), una cuenta especial de ahorro que añadirá fondos correspondientes cada que vez que usted ahorre.

content.en:
### Set a savings goal
Make a plan for building an emergency fund. Breaking down a savings goal by how much you'd need to save regularly, makes your big money goal more achievable.
content.es:
### Establezca una meta de ahorros
Elabore un plan para crear un fondo de emergencia. Dividir una meta de ahorros basandose en lo que necesite ahorrar regularmente, hace que su meta de mucho dinero sea mas alcanzable.

text.en: MAKE A PLAN TO ACHIEVE YOUR SAVINGS GOAL
text.es: HAGA UN PLAN PARA LOGRAR SUS METAS DE AHORRO

content.en:
### Set up automatic savings
Automatic withdrawal helps you save without having to think about it. Every month, some money from your checking account can be automatically deposited into your savings account. Decide on an amount that works for you, and ask your bank about it. Even $10 a month can make a big difference. Consider connecting your account to the EARN Starter Savings Program to get a maximum bonus of $60 for saving regularly in your account.
content.es:
### Prepare ahorros automaticos
Los retiros automaticos le ayudan a ahorrar sin tener que pensar en ello. Cada mes, un poco del dinero de su cuenta de cheques será depositada automaticamente a su cuenta de ahorros. Debe decidir una cantidad que se ajuste a usted y solicitarselo al banco. Incluso $10 al mes puede hacer una gran diferencia. Considere conectar su cuenta al Programa Inicial de Ahorros (EARN) para conseguir un bono maximo de $60 por ahorrar regularmente en su cuenta.

text.en: LEARN MORE ABOUT THE EARN STARTER SAVINGS PROGRAM
text.es: CONOZCA MAS SOBRE EL PROGRAMA "EARN STARTER SAVINGS"

content.en:
### Find a savings buddy
Find a friend that is also learning how to save and you can help each other stay on track. Whenever you’re feeling tempted or if saving feels difficult, this person will help you stay motivated.
content.es:
### Encuentre a un compañero de ahorro
Encuentre a un amigo que tambien esté aprendiendo a ahorrar y se puedan ayudar mutuamente, mantenganse unidos. Cuando sea que se sienta tentado a gastar sus ahorros o se le dificulte, esta persona le puede ayudar a mantenerse motivado.

content.en:
__Try a savings app__
There are free or low-cost apps available to help you start saving automatically. Every app works a little differently, so if you’re interested in using a savings app, find and stick with the one that works for you.
content.es:
__Try a savings app__
There are free or low-cost apps available to help you start saving automatically. Every app works a little differently, so if you’re interested in using a savings app, find and stick with the one that works for you.

No puedo pagar mis servicios publicos

text.en: I don't have any money saved
I won't be able to pay my rent for a while
